summary: An Egyptian mummy searches Cairo for the girl he thinks is his long-lost princess.
cast: Boris Karloff|Zita Johann|David Manners|Arthur Byron|Edward Van Sloan|Bramwell Fletcher|Noble Johnson|Kathryn Byron|Leonard Mudie|James Crane|Henry Victor|Arnold Gray|Florence Britton|Jack Deery|Bill Elliott|Leyland Hodgson|Eddie Kane|Tony Marlow|C. Montague Shaw|Pat Somerset|Arthur Tovey
title: La momia
